biotools.summary: PLAST-ncRNA is an online tool for aligning distantly similar non-coding RNA sequences to a genome using the Probalign program. Useful for detection of potential homologous ncRNA sequences in large genomes.

bioschemas.name: PLAST-ncRNA
bioschemas.summary: PLAST-ncRNA is an online tool for aligning distantly similar non-coding RNA sequences to a genome using the Probalign program. Useful for detection of potential homologous ncRNA sequences in large genomes.
